thread.title: Enrollment Rx to Present Demo of Higher Ed CRM Solution at Dreamforce ’15
thread.title_full: Enrollment Rx to Present Demo of Higher Ed CRM Solution at Dreamforce ’15

author: Robyn Fernsworth
title: Enrollment Rx to Present Demo of Higher Ed CRM Solution at Dreamforce ’15
text:
Enrollment Rx , the leading provider of cloud-based Constituent Relationship Management (CRM) solutions for higher education, today announced that the company will be presenting a demo at Dreamforce ’15: “Transforming Recruiting, Admissions and Enrollment with Enrollment Rx.” The demo, which will take place Thursday, September 17 at 12:00 noon PT in the Salesforce Foundation Zone , will discuss how Enrollment Rx can serve as a powerful CRM solution for higher ed engagement, recruiting, admissions and enrollment management. Who: Lawrence Levy, CEO, Enrollment Rx
What: Demo of Enrollment Rx CRM: “Transforming Recruiting, Admissions and Enrollment with Enrollment Rx.”
Where: Salesforce Foundation Zone, San Francisco Marriott Marquis Hotel, Yerba Buena, Salon 7
When: Thursday, September 17, 12:00 noon - 12:20 p.m. PT
During the demo, Enrollment Rx CEO Lawrence Levy will discuss using Enrollment Rx to redefine enrollment management, including how to:
● Deliver a custom applicant portal where prospective students can apply online in a dynamic, branded environment.
● Take advantage of rich event management functionality with drag-and-drop configuration capabilities to easily generate registration web pages, track participants from sign-up through attendance, and use QR codes to track event attendance.
● Supercharge data import capabilities with higher ed-specific functionality to effortlessly load data from various sources, including: ACT, College Board, Common Application, GRE, GMAT, etc.
Held in San Francisco, September 15-18, 2015, Dreamforce is the world’s largest vendor technology conference. The Enrollment Rx booth will be located in the Foundation Zone exhibit area. You can also follow @EnrollmentRx on Twitter and LinkedIn , and Dreamforce ‘15 happenings on Twitter with the #Dreamforce hashtag.
About Enrollment Rx
Enrollment Rx is a higher education technology vendor, which provides innovative cloud-based CRM solutions that span the entire student lifecycle. Built on salesforce.com’s cloud computing platform, Enrollment Rx puts enterprise-class functionality and limitless scalability within reach of any size school. Academic institutions like the University of Miami, Babson College and Saint Louis University rely on Enrollment Rx to eliminate business process inefficiencies, maximize constituent engagement, and future proof their business for tomorrow.
